resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

string-array.name: faq_stu
string-array.item:
What are easy solutions and why do I need to pay for the same?

Easy Solutions are the comprehensive solutions for the past years’ question papers of KJSCE; prepared cohesively by the respective subject faculty. These solutions are “marking-scheme specific” and give an excellent idea about the answer expectations with respect to length of the answers and content of the answers. The weightage of this valuable resource makes it a paid one.

Is PayPal a secure site for my online transactions?

Paypal is the easiest way to make payments online. While checking out your order, you will be redirected to the Paypal website. Be sure to fill in correct details for fast hassle-free payment processing. After a successful Paypal payment, a payment advice will be automatically generated to Samplestore.com system for your order. It's fast, easy and secure.

How do I cancel my order, under considerate circumstances, after the amount is already paid?

You may have to confront the A/O for the refund, which will strictly be subjected to extreme cases.

Are we allowed offline mode of payment for easy solutions, for necessary reasons if any? 

No.The students should strictly use the online options such as net banking and PayPal that are being provided in the App.

I click on a card to download but nothing happens. Why is it so?

1.Go to app settings of your phone and then go to Google Drive.
2.Set Open Link to "Always Ask" and then retry downloading.
If it still does not download, write to us at the e-mail address below.
It is recommended that you choose Google Chrome to download different file formats (PDFs, JPEGs,DOCX, PPTX, XLSX).

How do I contact the professor for queries?

The navigation view has a “Ask a doubt” tab, which will direct you to your default mailing app. You can then mail your concerns to your professor.

How do I notify developers about force crash, if any?

Do not worry. We have set up Crashlytics, which sends us real time force crash issues, so that user does not have to take the initiative of finding logcats and then mailing it to us separately.

string-array.name: faq_tch
string-array.item:
How do I upload the new updated syllabus?

The new syllabus uploaded by you will automatically overwrite the old one. Hence no issues.

Do I get to change the name of the file uploaded?

No. You have to name the file properly and then upload. Please set an appropriate name before uploading for convenience of the students to understand what is in the file.

Should the previous year papers be categorised before uploading?

Yes. You should upload them separately under the “Term test papers” and “End Sem Papers" Section.

How does Add Events enhance the flexibility of our interaction with students?

You can easily add events for tests, viva, practical schedule, quiz, lecture cancellation etc. and the students will be notified about the same.

How do I notify developers about force crash, if any?

Do not worry. We have set up Crashlytics, which sends us real time force crash issues and sends us the relevant logs to work upon, so that user doesn't have to take the initiative of finding logcats and then mailing it to us separately.
